title: IEX trade volume rises 24% in September
description: Indian Energy Exchange's trade volume surged 24% year-on-year to 11,370 million units in September 2024. Electricity volume increased 21% to 10,332 MU, with Renewable Energy Certificates doubling to 1,031 MU. A steady monsoon boosted hydro and wind generation, lowering Day-Ahead and Real-Time market prices significantly.
